title: Back End Developer
description:
**Company Description** 

 Saveit Fintech is an innovative startup revolutionizing India‚Äôs digital gift card market with a universal aggregation and hybrid payment platform. The platform connects fragmented issuers, brands, and merchants into a seamless ecosystem, enabling users to redeem and combine gift cards with UPI for partial payments. Saveit‚Äôs solutions cater to both consumers and enterprises, providing secure integrations, real\\-time analytics, fraud protection, and regulatory compliance. Backed by renowned institutions like AIC\\-BIMTECH and Ratan Tata Innovation Hub and by the Govt of Uttar Pradesh under StartinUP initiative, Saveit is driven by its mission to simplify digital gifting and expand financial inclusion across India's rapidly growing fintech and digital rewards market.
 



  




**Role Description** 

 This is a full\\-time
 **on\\-site** 
 role for a
 **Backend Developer (Node.js)** 
 located in Greater Noida, India.
 



 You will be responsible for building and maintaining SaveIt‚Äôs secure, scalable backend systems that power automated savings, workflow automation, and financial operations.
 



 The role includes:
 


* Designing, developing, and maintaining backend microservices using
 **Node.js** 
 and
 **NestJS**
* **Building secure, well\\-structured REST APIs** 
 and integrating them with front\\-end and mobile teams
* Implementing workflow and business logic for automated financial processes
* Working with
 **PostgreSQL** 
 , caching layers, background jobs, and distributed systems
* Handling deployments, version control, cloud environments (AWS/GCP), and monitoring
* Writing clean, modular, testable, and secure code that meets fintech\\-grade standards
* Troubleshooting issues in live environments and optimizing performance
* Collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to ensure seamless end\\-to\\-end user experience



 A positive, collaborative work environment is core to SaveIt‚Äôs culture, and the role requires working closely with product and engineering teams to ship reliable, high\\-quality systems.
 



  




**Qualifications** 
* 2\\+ years of experience in
 **Backend Development** 
 , especially with
 **Node.js and NestJS**
* **Solid understanding of Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP)** 
 and microservices
* Experience building and consuming
 **REST APIs**
* **Good knowledge of PostgreSQL**
* **Familiarity with AWS or GCP** 
 , CI/CD, and backend deployment workflows
* Ability to write clean, efficient, reusable, and testable code
* Problem\\-solving mindset with the ability to thrive in a fast\\-paced technical environment
* Basic understanding of front\\-end development to collaborate effectively
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field or equivalent experience.



  




**Plus Points** 
* **Experience with ERP systems (Odoo, SAP, Zoho, TallyPrime, Oracle, or custom ERPs)**
* Understanding of workflow automation and enterprise logic
* Familiarity with RBAC and structured data models
* Experience with fintech APIs, payments, or financial integrations
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills

description:
A "Senior Software Engineer‚Äù is a mid\\-level professional focused on leading the design and implementation of inhouse\\-built or in the integration of third\\-party software solutions (incl. software\\-as\\-a\\-service) used by our business teams. You will find yourself involved in the entire development lifecycle, starting with the support of the business analysis phase up to production deployment and 3rd level operations support.

**Collaboration** 




 ‚Ä¢ Actively participate in the development and review of software standards, software solution documentation and implementation within the Business Application Group‚Äôs platform(s) of your expertise as well as providing guidance to junior colleagues in form of active peer reviews
 



 ‚Ä¢ Establish strong relationship with business stakeholders, team members and work closely with platforms across Business Application Group‚Äôs chapters
 



**Leadership**

**Hiring guidance:** 




 The typical education and professional experience required for a Senior Software Engineer is a master‚Äôs degree plus at least 7 years of working experience or working in a similar role. A successful candidate has proven experience of leading a team of software developers (3\\+ engineers) or has previously managed complex system environments. Further, a successful candidate has superior programming experience, preferably in Java or Python and relevant experience of software development lifecycle, databases (SQL), operating systems, OOPS and cloud technology.

title: Senior Quality Assurance Automation Engineer
description:
**Position**




 We are looking for a skilled QA Automation Engineer with expertise in Selenium with Serenity and familiarity with Playwright. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both Java and Python, enabling them to develop and maintain automated test scripts efficiently. Additionally, this role requires the ability to conduct manual testing to ensure comprehensive test coverage and product quality.
 



**Roles \\& Responsibilities:**



* Review requirements to identify all areas of functional and non\\-functional testing required within the timeframe.
* Develop, maintain, and execute automated test scripts using Selenium with Serenity and Playwright.
* Create and Execute Manual tests and provide official QA Signoff.
* Maintain Manul Test cases using Jira Xray.
* Ensure the product meets the minimum quality standards, is fully functional and user\\-friendly.
* Ensure the full application of all relevant quality assurance protocols, processes, and procedures.
* Adhere to agreed\\-upon functional specifications and applicable quality assurance standards.
* Stay updated on industry best practices, tools, and technologies related to QA automation and incorporate them into our testing practices.



**Requirements / Qualifications**



* Bachelors‚Äô Degree with 7\\-9 years of experience in Manual and
 **Python based Automation testing**
* Should worked on BDD framework and experience on Behave feature
* Knowledge of Serenity, Cucumber Playwright, Puppeteer
* Proven experience of optimizing existing Test suits and identifying performance issues.
* Proven experience of parallelizing the tests to improve performance.
* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
* Create test plans and test cases per requirements and design in a trailing QA agile environment.
* Identify and prioritize test cases for manual testing/automation, considering both functional and non\\-functional requirements.
* Execute test cases across all functional areas of our product.
* Investigate and analyze test results, troubleshoot issues, and work with development teams to resolve defects.
* Work with developers to understand overall technical architecture and how features are implemented.
* Review requirements with business to evaluate impact on existing product functionality.



**Nice to have:**



* Knowledge of alternative frameworks like Playwright
* Knowledge of Java
* Knowledge on API testing using potman tool.
* Experience of testing Client facing SaaS products
* experience with Performance testing using jMeter/K6



**Shift Timings:**



* 1PM to 10 PM IST

title: ML Research Intern
description:
**Company Description** 




 Peach Blocks is a bootstrapped AI research startup focused on cutting\\-edge machine learning, computer vision, and robotics applications. Founded by IIT and NIT alumni with industry experience, we're building innovative solutions in LLM fine\\-tuning, edge deployment, and sensor fusion. Our team works on real\\-world AI problems with access to high\\-performance GPU infrastructure (RTX 5090, 4070, 3070\\) for training and fine\\-tuning models up to 8B parameters. We're committed to publishing research, contributing to open\\-source, and mentoring the next generation of AI researchers. As a self\\-funded startup, we prioritize investment in computational resources and research infrastructure to push the boundaries of AI innovation.¬†
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a remote research internship (3\\-6 months) where you'll work directly with our founding team on cutting\\-edge AI projects across three tracks: ML Research (LLM Fine\\-Tuning for multilingual applications), Computer Vision (edge deployment on Jetson/mobile platforms), or Robotics \\& Sensor Fusion (multimodal systems for vision\\-language models). You'll participate in weekly assignments and review sessions, contribute to research, and gain hands\\-on experience with state\\-of\\-the\\-art tools like PyTorch, Transformers, ONNX, TensorRT, and ROS. This internship is designed for students seeking research experience and portfolio development, with opportunities for technical blog writing, open\\-source contributions, and potential full\\-time positions for top performers after graduation.¬†
 



  





**Qualifications** 




 ‚Ä¢ Currently enrolled as an engineering student (2nd year preferred) in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or Physics\\-related streams¬†
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong foundational knowledge in matrices, partial differential equations (PDEs), and vectors at engineering level¬†
 



 ‚Ä¢ IIT JEE mathematics and physics scores (to gauge mathematical aptitude and basic foundation which is critical to be successful in the internship)¬†
 



 ‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Python programming
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience with PyTorch, TensorFlow, or similar ML frameworks (bonus skill)¬†
 



 ‚Ä¢ For CV role: Knowledge of OpenCV, ONNX, TensorRT, and model optimization (bonus skill)¬†
 



 ‚Ä¢ For Robotics role: Familiarity with C\\+\\+ and ROS¬†(bonus skill)¬†
 



 ‚Ä¢ For LLM role: Understanding of Transformers, Hugging Face, and fine\\-tuning techniques (LoRA/QLoRA)¬†(bonus skill)¬†
 



 ‚Ä¢ Self\\-motivated with ability to work independently with guidance and mentorship¬†
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong problem\\-solving skills, time management skills and eagerness to learn¬†
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ability to commit 3\\-6 months with flexible hours that accommodate college schedule

title: LLM Agent Engineer(Freelance | WFH)
description:
**About BeGig** 




 BeGig is the leading tech freelancing marketplace. We connect innovation\\-driven founders with highly skilled AI engineers and agent\\-automation specialists.
 



  





**Your Opportunity** 




 Join BeGig as an LLM Agent Engineer and build intelligent, autonomous agents powered by large language models. You‚Äôll design multi\\-step reasoning systems, tool\\-using agents, and dynamic workflows for real\\-world automation.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 As an LLM Agent Engineer, you will:
 


* Build autonomous agents using frameworks like LangChain, AutoGen, CrewAI, or custom tooling.
* Implement memory, retrieval, tool calling, and reasoning loops.
* Integrate agents with APIs, vector stores, and real\\-time data sources.
* Design evaluation strategies to test reliability, safety, and performance.
* Collaborate with product and engineering teams to deploy agents into production.



  





**Technical Requirements \\& Skills** 



* Experience: 2\\+ years in AI engineering, LLM integration, or agentic systems.
* Tools: LangChain, AutoGen, LlamaIndex, vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate).
* Programming: Strong Python skills with async, APIs, and orchestration experience.
* AI: Understanding of embeddings, RAG pipelines, and prompt engineering.
* Infra: Familiarity with deploying agent stacks to cloud or container environments.



  





**What We‚Äôre Looking For** 



* Engineer who understands both the power and limitations of autonomous LLMs.
* Creative problem\\-solver who can design reliable and interpretable agent behaviors.
* Passionate about next\\-generation automation and multi\\-agent ecosystems.



  





**Why Join Us?** 



* Impact: Build agents that automate real workflows across industries.
* Flexibility: Work remotely on advanced AI automation systems.
* Innovation: Join a network of bleeding\\-edge AI engineers and agent architects.

description:
**About the Company:** 




 At Prosperr.io, we are transforming the way individuals and organizations manage taxes and employee benefits. As a pioneering fintech SaaS platform, we empower employees to maximize their in\\-hand salaries and enable businesses to design smarter, compliant, and efficient tax strategies. Through cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven automation and intuitive tools, Prosperr.io simplifies financial complexities, providing seamless solutions tailored to the needs of salaried professionals and HR leaders alike. Founded by Manas and Dev Kumar, the company specializes in assisting salaried individuals with tax planning, management, and income tax filing. Recently, Prosperr.io raised $1\\.55 million in pre\\-seed funding, led by a prominent investor.
 



  





  





  





**Mission and Vision of the company:** 




 Our mission is to empower individuals and businesses with innovative, accessible tools that simplify tax management, tax saving allowances, optimize tax savings and drive financial clarity and well\\-being. Our goal is to be India‚Äôs most trusted platform for smart financial and tax solutions, enabling financial security for all.
 



  





  





  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Design, develop, and deploy scalable, high\\-quality software solutions.
* Write efficient, maintainable, and reusable code with a focus on performance and reliability.
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
* Lead technical discussions and guide junior engineers through architecture and design decisions.
* Optimize applications for maximum speed, scalability, and security.
* Participate in code reviews to maintain high code quality and provide constructive feedback to peers.

* Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

* Strong proficiency in at least one modern programming language (e.g., Java, Python, C\\#, Go, or similar).
* Experience with designing and building scalable RESTful APIs and micro\\-services architecture.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS
* Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.
* Experience with databases (SQL and NoSQL) and performance optimisation techniques.
* Familiarity with version control systems (Git) and CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to articulate technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.



  





  





**Preferred Qualifications:**

**What We Offer:** 



* Competitive salary and equity options.
* Flexible working hours.
* A dynamic, inclusive, and collaborative work environment.
* Opportunities for rapid growth and career advancement.
* Access to cutting\\-edge tools and technologies.
* Health and wellness benefits.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Job Summary:** 




 We are looking for a skilled
 **CMOD Engineer** 
 with 4‚Äì8 years of experience in designing, configuring, and supporting enterprise document archiving solutions using
 **IBM Content Manager OnDemand (CMOD)** 
 . The role involves managing ingestion workflows, indexing, storage optimization, system support, and integrations with other enterprise applications.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Configure and maintain CMOD components (OnDemand Server, ODWEK, Loaders, Object Servers) and manage application groups, applications, indexing rules, folders, and retention settings, including handling AFP, PDF, and line data formats.
* Build and support document/report ingestion workflows, set up load sources, indexing, and batch ingestion processes, and automate ingestion pipelines using scripts and scheduled jobs.
* Develop automation scripts using Shell/Python/Perl, support integrations with upstream/downstream applications through ODWEK APIs or web services, and assist with debugging ingestion and retrieval issues.
* Monitor CMOD performance, caching, indexing, and storage utilization, optimize archival strategies for large repositories, and collaborate with infrastructure teams for storage pool and backup management.
* Provide L2/L3 support for ingestion failures, indexing and retrieval issues, analyze logs, run diagnostics, resolve production problems, and ensure system stability, security, and compliance.
* Document ingestion flows, configurations, and operational procedures, work closely with DevOps, Infra, ECM, and business teams, and participate in testing, release cycles, and production deployments.



  





**Required Skills:** 



* 4‚Äì8 years of hands\\-on experience with IBM CMOD administration and support.
* Strong understanding of application groups, indexing configuration, folder structures, and loaders.
* Knowledge of AFP/PDF/Line data formats and document ingestion processes.
* Proficiency in Shell scripting and SQL for job automation and debugging.
* Experience working on Linux/Unix environments.
* Strong problem\\-solving, troubleshooting, and analysis skills.

title: Staff SW Engineer (Java Full stack, GenAI, 7+ years' exp)
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose ‚Äì to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 Make an impact with a purpose\\-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 Visa‚Äôs Technology Organization is a community of problem solvers and innovators reshaping the future of commerce. We operate the world‚Äôs most sophisticated processing networks capable of handling more than 65k secure transactions a second across 80M merchants, 15k Financial Institutions, and billions of everyday people. While working with us you‚Äôll get to work on complex distributed systems and solve massive scale problems centered on new payment flows, business and data solutions, cyber security, and B2C platforms.
   

  





 The Opportunity:
   

  





 We are looking for Versatile, curious, and energetic Software Engineers who embrace solving complex challenges on a global scale. As a Visa Software Engineer, you will be an integral part of a multi\\-functional development team inventing, designing, building, and testing software products that reach a truly global customer base. While building components of powerful payment technology, you will get to see your efforts shaping the digital future of monetary transactions.
   

  





 The Responsibilities:
   

  




* Proven experience leading teams that have delivered high quality large scale enterprise class applications.
* Demonstrates relevant technical working knowledge to understand requirements.
* You are a Java expert, and you have experience with Rest API's, JSON and exposure to container\\- based technologies.
* Working experience with Kafka, Elastic search and Spark is a plus. Working experience in React and Vertx is a plus.
* Should have very good understanding in GenAI technology and built product using any LLM.
* Hands on experience with database technologies like MSSQL and Oracle.
* You have strong experience with Agile development incorporating Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery, utilizing technologies such as GIT, Maven, Jenkins, Chef, Sonar, JUnit Ensure proper metrics instruction in software components, to help facilitate real time and remote troubleshooting/performance monitoring
* Knowledge of Unix/Linux and working in a shell environment. Understand and own component security analysis, including code and data flow review.
* Collaborate with security team to implement and verify secure coding techniques.
* We count on your curiosity and creativity, to want to understand customer requirements and our processes and want to come up with creative solutions and improvements.
* While you'll have the skill to see and understand the big picture, you're able to stay focused on the task at hand to achieve immediate goals.
* You have a strong work ethic to focus on our goals.
* Experience with Agile and Test\\-Driven Development methodology.
* You have proven experience as a technical leader with ability to understand the requirements and independently, architect, design and build the solution.
* You have the passion to work with people and help mentor your juniors to reach new heights.
* As an end\\-to\\-end champion for your products, you will have strong debugging and Unix skills to help support our Operations teams.
* Ability to write clean, coherent code following established coding guidelines
* Strong interpersonal and effective communication skills (Both written and verbal)
* Highly driven, resourceful and results oriented.



 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in office will be confirmed by your hiring manager.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**

 Basic Qualifications:
   

  




* 7\\+ years of relevant work experience with a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree or with an Advanced degree.
* Java expert and you have experience with Rest API's, JSON and exposure to container\\-based technologies.
* Working experience with Kafka, Elastic search and Spark is a plus. Working experience in React and Vertx is a plus.
* Should have very good understanding in GenAI technology and built product using any LLM.
* Hands on experience with database technologies like MSSQL and Oracle.
* Experience with Agile development incorporating CI/CD, utilizing technologies such as GIT, Maven, Jenkins, Chef, Sonar, JUnit etc.
* Experience with Agile and Test\\-Driven Development methodology


**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: Principal SE - Java, Spring & Cloud
description:
**Job Description**
**Job Title: Principal Software Engineer**
**The Purpose of this Role**
 Produce high\\-quality, testable, readable, and easily maintainable code. Participate in and lead all phases of the development process, from conception to deployment as a member of an agile, cross\\-functional team. Demonstrates leadership and maintains a continuous technology progressive mentality. Supports junior associates to develop solutions that improve processes.
   

  

**The Expertise You Have**
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, Engineering or Equivalent.
* You have hands\\-on experience in building the interconnected systems that enable a business to operate, including hardware, software, network and database.
* Very Strong expertise in updating and maintaining legacy systems to leverage modern technologies and architectures.
* You have the expertise and experience in designing and developing microservices which can handle high Transaction Per Second traffic.
* Strong understanding of data governance principles and best practices.
* You are experienced with a variety of modern programming languages and frameworks. 10\\+ years of experience working with Java, Springboot, Oracle, Kubernetes, Kafka, Azure/AWS cloud technologies.
* You have a passion for technology and can stay on top of latest technology trends.
* Good working knowledge on ITIL processes like Incident management, Change management etc.,
* You have hands\\-on experience leading or mentoring scrum teams focused on building software solutions for business critical, architecturally distributed experiences. The teams you have worked with have multi\\-functional responsibilities such as engineering, quality, devops and release implementation.
* You care about cycle time and use CI/CD practices, tools to rapidly deploy changes to production while minimizing risk.
* Have strong communication skills and technical expertise to drive and participate in meaningful discussions with partners across different roles and different skillsets.


**The Skills That Are Key To This Role**
* Hands on experience in Java, Spring, Springboot, Event/Listener messaging frameworks
* Hands on experience in Designing and Developing Robust RESTful API
* Hands on experience in Hashicorp Vault, Terraform and Packer
* Hands on experience in Kubernetes tools and services, including managed Kubernetes platforms, service meshes, monitoring solutions, and security tools
* In\\-depth understanding on API Management ‚Äì Stratum/Apigee
* Proven experience in designing, deploying, and maintaining cloud infrastructure across platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. preferably Azure ‚Äì Namespace, AKS, ASB, Data Factory, API Management, Storage Account, and Redis.
* Hands on experience in container\\-based development (Docker)
* Hands on experience working with EDA solutions such as Kafka/ MQ
* Hands on experience working with database and data concepts, tools and technologies (Oracle, PL/SQL Informatica)
* Familiarity working with OAuth 2\\.0 framework and scopes
* Experience in implementing Micro services Architecture \\& building / deploying highly automated, scalable and maintainable infrastructure.
* Experience in designing and developing apps with high throughput and low latency utilizing load balancing, caching, threading etc.
* Knowledge on CD process and tools, testing frameworks and practices (GitHub, Jenkins, uDeploy, Stash)
* Strategic thinking and critical problem\\-solving skills


**Good To Have Skills To This Role**
* Knowledge in Control M, DB2 to CICS, Cloud to CICS and MAUI


**The Value You Deliver**
* Define, develop, and implement application\\-level architecture hosted in the cloud.
* Use your expertise and leadership to influence and gain consensus on how to proceed, remove impediments and strive for robust team success sprint over sprint.
* Consistently making culture choices that positively impact the team, helping the team to create a better work environment.
* Understand the leadership vision and own the execution of that vision.
* Cultivate a culture of best\\-in\\-class software engineering practices
* Deliver system automation by setting up continuous integration/continuous delivery pipelines
* Communicate effectively in team environment.
* Identify departmental needs and make suggestions regarding technical direction.
* The team will view you as an advocate for continuous learning helping them improve sprint over sprint. You help build a trustful, open environment which is encouraging of problem solving and experimentation.


**The Expertise We‚Äôre Looking For**
* 10\\+ years of experience. Completed three or more projects on commercially available applications.
* B.E./B Tech in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, or equivalent experience.


**BU Overview**
**How Your Work Impacts the Organization**
 WI (Workplace Investments) helps our customers save and invest through workplace retirement savings plans, build lifetime relationships with customers and provide employers with cost\\-effective, integrated employee benefit solutions. WI serves customers online, over the phone, and through a nationwide network of investor centers. WI is also committed to helping drive employee retirement readiness by delivering leading\\-edge financial solutions to employers, including recordkeeping, cash management products and services and personal advisory services (PAS).
   

  

**Location** 
 Chennai
   

  

**Shift timings** 
 : 11:00 am \\- 08:00pm
   

  

**Certifications**
 Category:
   

  

 Information Technology

 **Senior Frontend Engineer** 
 with deep experience in crypto trading interfaces, perpetual futures, and real\\-time data systems.
 



 This role requires someone who can architect high\\-performance UI, think like a trader, and build clean, responsive interfaces that operate flawlessly under heavy load.

 using WebSockets, live data feeds, and high\\-frequency updates.
* Implementing advanced UI for
 **perpetual futures, derivatives, leverage controls, and position management** 
 .
* Handling real\\-time orderbooks, depth charts, funding data, PnL, and execution flows.
* Integrating with
 **Web3 wallets** 
 and on\\-chain data sources.
* Designing UX flows for active traders who expect speed, clarity, and flawless execution.

**Requirements**

* Strong background in
 **Web3** 
 , crypto, or blockchain\\-based products.

 or

title: Data Engineer - Sr. Consultant
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose ‚Äì to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 Make an impact with a purpose\\-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**
* Lead architecture and delivery of large‚Äëscale data platforms (ingestion, transformation, storage, metadata, lineage, quality, governed access)
* Design high‚Äëvolume batch and streaming pipelines (Spark/Flink/Kafka) with clear SLAs/SLOs, observability, and cost/performance targets for global transaction processing.
* Build and harden back‚Äëend services and APIs (REST/gRPC authN/Z, rate limiting, quotas, resilience patterns) that power data products and model operations on Kubernetes.
* Partner with Product Team to translate requirements into secure, robust solutions be the team‚Äôs technical representative across forums and stakeholders.
* Drive proofs of concept to de‚Äërisk tech choices quickly prototype, then lead or hand off for productionization with best practices.
* Champion engineering standards\\- CI/CD, TDD, data contracts, catalog/governance, PII handling, RBAC/ABAC, audit, retention.
* Establish domain‚Äëoriented data models (warehouse/lakehouse/data mesh) and semantic layers enabling analytics
* Own reliability for pipelines and services: metrics, incident response, capacity planning, continuous improvement
* Mentor senior engineers and onboard new joiners foster mutual accountability and effective cross‚Äëtime‚Äëzone collaboration.
* GenAI enablement\\- build/enhance RAG pipelines architect/optimize AI agents for planning/reasoning/acting integrate MCP tools/clients leverage LangChain/LangGraph contribute to prompt design and fine‚Äëtuning.



 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in office will be confirmed by your hiring manager.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**

 12\\+ years in data/software engineering with significant ownership of large‚Äëscale, production‚Äëgrade systems Bachelor‚Äôs or advanced degree.
   

  

 Strong back‚Äëend experience: 3‚Äì5\\+ years building and operating production services (Java/Scala/Go/Python Spring Boot or equivalent REST/gRPC).
   

  

 Big Data engineering: Hadoop/Spark, Python, SQL expert in ETL/ELT and maintaining scalable Spark pipelines.
   

  

 Streaming/messaging: Kafka (Connect, schema registry, delivery semantics) familiarity with Hazelcast or similar in‚Äëmemory tech.
   

  

 Containers/cloud/platform: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS (or GCP/Azure) Infra‚Äëas‚ÄëCode (Terraform).
   

  

 Orchestration and scheduling: Airflow, Control‚ÄëM (or equivalent) CI/CD with Git, Jenkins/GitHub Actions, Maven/Gradle.
   

  

 Databases and modeling: relational (PostgreSQL/DB2\\), NoSQL (MongoDB/Cassandra) strong SQL and data modeling (star/snowflake, 3NF, domain‚Äëdriven).
   

  

 Distributed systems and performance: familiarity with parallel/distributed architectures tuning and evaluation for large systems.
   

  

 Observability: Prometheus/Grafana/OpenTelemetry metrics and operational excellence in high‚Äëthroughput environments.
   

  

 Security/compliance: component security analysis, IAM/least‚Äëprivilege collaboration with security teams on risk and controls.
   

  

 Practices: Agile/TDD code quality initiatives ability to work independently and across teams excellent communication and stakeholder partnership.
   

  

 Leadership: proven technical leadership, cross‚Äëorg influence, mentoring passion, and ability to represent the team in technical forums.
   

  

 GenAI expertise: experience with RAG pipelines, AI agents, MCP tools/clients, LangChain/LangGraph prompt crafting and contributions to model fine‚Äëtuning for task performance and alignment.
   

  

  

  




**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.
